title: PITR lag increase during br restore
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
master

### What operating system and CPU are you using?
K8S

### Steps to reproduce
1. Run workload
2. Start PITR log backup task
3. Do a BR restore
4. Check checkpoint lag

### What did you expect?
1. PITR lag should not be impacted during br restore.

### What did happened?
1. PITR lag increases during br restore.
